title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Ops in the AI age: Innovating together for faster, more efficient operations
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI时代的运维：携手创新，实现更快速、更高效的运营
abstract: The rise of generative and agentic AI is transforming how organizations build, operate, and secure applications. As systems become increasingly autonomous and complex, intelligent operations are essential. Join us to discover how AWS Cloud Operations continues to innovate—helping you monitor AI agents wherever deployed, operate smarter across environments, and unlock insights through accelerated analytics. Explore AWS-native and managed open-source observability providing visibility into distributed AI systems. Experience faster querying and automated incident report generation for complex problem-solving. Through customer stories and demos, discover proven patterns for transforming operations to be more intelligent, secure, and efficient.
abstract_cn: 生成式和智能体AI的兴起正在改变组织构建、运营和保护应用程序的方式。随着系统变得越来越自主和复杂，智能运营变得至关重要。加入我们，了解AWS云运营如何持续创新——帮助您监控部署在任何地方的AI智能体，跨环境更智能地运营，并通过加速分析解锁洞察。探索AWS原生和托管开源可观测性，为分布式AI系统提供可见性。体验更快的查询和自动化事件报告生成，用于复杂问题解决。通过客户案例和演示，发现将运营转变为更智能、更安全、更高效的经验证模式。
